definitions.title: vb. shrink back, crawl away
definitions.body: (Aram. [[זְחַל]] crawl (also drop, drip, of water: so NH [[זׇחַל]]), [[זׇחֵיל]] worm; Syr. zoh.lo0 locust (as crawling); Ar. zah.ala withdraw, retire to a distance (v. Lane, Wetzst in De:Hiob 2, 428), and Sab. [[זחַל]] withdraw, humble oneself DHM:ZMG 1875, 610)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: only Pt. pl. cstr. [[זׁחֲלֵי]] De 32:24, Mic 7:17; —crawl, of reptiles (pt.) [[זׁחֲלֵי עָפָר]] De 32:24 i.e. serpents (as poisonous), instruments of Yahweh's judgment on Isr.; [[ארץ]] ´[[ז]] Mic 7:17 id. (as crawling into the earth to hide), sim. of nations in fear of ´[[י]].
